definition: variant of 徹底|彻底[che4 di3]
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: The farm must be cleaned completely.
sentences.chinese: 整个农场必须澈底清洁干净。

sentences.english: He completely understands the unlimited three periods of Time and Space.
sentences.chinese: 他可以澈底明白无限的时空。

sentences.english: You must thoroughly change your bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 要澈底改掉你的坏习惯。

definition: in order that/so that/so as to/to cause sth
to rinse/to wash/to clean/to purge/to comb out
lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined/a great sage has died (idiom)
watchtower on either side of a city gate/(literary) city/imperial palace
Pengze county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
to get rid of/to dismiss/to brush aside
sinuous/meandering/to take a circuitous route/to toss about/vicissitudes/variant of 婉轉|婉转[wan3 zhuan3]
